body:
As the PR page gives a HTTP 500 I cannot easily see which actions happened in the history of this PR.
So unfortunately I don't know the exact steps to reproduce.

issue.title: CommentTypeDismissReview are not deleted when deleting a Review

repository.name: gitea
repository.description: Git with a cup of tea! Painless self-hosted all-in-one software development service, including Git hosting, code review, team collaboration, package registry and CI/CD

issue.body:
### Description

Now that some error logging has been added in 1.20.5, I have been able to find the root cause of #27306:

When [deleting a review](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/796ff26e0e9de8dc746064e57db13518dedcf671/models/issues/review.go#L863-L911), comments of type [CommentTypeDismissReview](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/796ff26e0e9de8dc746064e57db13518dedcf671/models/issues/comment.go#L105C2-L105C27) are not deleted.

### Gitea Version

1.20.5

### Can you reproduce the bug on the Gitea demo site?

Yes

### Log Gist

_No response_

### Screenshots

_No response_

### Git Version

_No response_

### Operating System

_No response_

### How are you running Gitea?

docker

### Database

PostgreSQL
